Name: Pink Lemonade
Ingredients: 12.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare lemon slice wheel for garnish.
Review: A tall, pink, tangy alcohol-free cocktail.
History: Discovered in 2004 in New York City.
Nutrition: One serving of Pink Lemonade contains 84 calories
